item.title: Covid 19 coronavirus Delta outbreak: NZ to have vaccine passport by Christmas
item.description: Meant for international travel, a debate looms for the country on how the passports will be used domestically, Justin Giovannetti writes for The Spinoff . A vaccine passport is coming. New Zealanders will soon have access to digital...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202137/airport_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Colloquially known as a "vaccine passport", a government-run app will soon be as indispensable as a real passport for international travel. Photo / Alex Burton

item.title: Covid-19: Predicting Delta's spread with NZ's 'super model'
item.description: Pick a neighbourhood in any New Zealand town or city, and then drop a single, hypothetical case of Covid-19 into it. ‌ Imagine that, from this one point, you could watch the coronavirus snake out into local schools, or...

item.title: Facebook sorry for 'primates' label on video of Black men
item.description: Facebook has apologised for putting a "primates" label on a video of Black men, according to a report in the New York Times.The newspaper said the video was posted by a tabloid in June and showed Black men in altercations with white...
